meanings.definition: A revised edition of a text.
meanings.sent1: The recension of the book included new illustrations.
meanings.sent2: The recension of the article fixed all the errors.
meanings.sent3: The recension of the play added funny jokes for the characters.
meanings.sent4: Her recension of the poem brought new life to the words.
meanings.sent5: The recension of the manual made it easier to understand.

meanings.definition: The process of editing and revising a text.
meanings.sent1: Careful recension is important to ensure the document is error-free.
meanings.sent2: The recension of the report improved its clarity.
meanings.sent3: The recension of the essay felt like solving a puzzle.
meanings.sent4: His recension of the manuscript was meticulous and thorough.
meanings.sent5: Recension involves checking for spelling mistakes and grammar errors.

meanings.definition: A critical revision of a text.
meanings.sent1: The recension of the thesis highlighted the flaws in the argument.
meanings.sent2: Her recension of the novel pointed out inconsistencies in the plot.
meanings.sent3: The recension of the speech was so harsh, it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His recension of the article was like a magnifying glass on the mistakes.
meanings.sent5: The recension of the play was like a spotlight on the weak points.
